welcome_message_body: Welcome to Treviso, Italy! This charming city is known for its beautiful canals, historic architecture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Treviso has to offer during your visit. Buon viaggio!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Unlimited free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aviano Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aviano Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
